input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: ActiveDirectory

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values: DisableGC, EnableGC, DisableComputer, EnableComputer, EnableComputers, RemoveMember, RenameComputer, RenameComputerAccount, AddAccount, AddAccounts, DisableUser, EnableUser, EnableUsers, SetAccountExpiry, SetAccountExpiryDuration, ADAMContainer, ADAMGroup, ADAMAddMember, ADAMRemoveMember, ADAMInetOrgPerson, ADAMOU, ADAMUser, ADAMContact, ResetPassword, AddComputerAccount, AddComputerAccounts, ChangePasswordNextLogon, SetPasswordExpiry, SetPasswordModificationRights, SetPasswordReversibleEncryption, SetGroupType, SetGroupScope, ModifyQuota

This element is required if a target will be referenced or defined in the request. In the absence of this element, the default target in the Adapter configuration will be used.
Value takes the form:
<target> <host></host> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </target>
The distinguished name of the object.

Contains the required/optional parameter list for the command.
Value takes the form:
<parameters> ...... ...... ...... </parameters>
version The Active Directory Application version. The current supported version is v2003

documentation.description:
Update Items Update one or more items within Active Directory and ADAM.
Update Items support following operations: Disable GC, Enable GC, Disable Computer, Enable Computer, Enable Computers, Remove Member, Rename Computer, Rename Computer Account, Add Account, Add Accounts, Disable User, Enable User, Enable Users, Set Account Expiry, Modify ADAM Container, Modify ADAM Group, ADAM Add Member, ADAM Remove Member, Modify ADAM InetOrgPerson, Modify ADAM OU, Modify ADAM User, Modify ADAM Contact, Reset Password, Add Computer Account, Add Computer Accounts
